desc.zh-Hans: 乌鲁木齐地铁（Urumqi Metro）是服务于中国新疆维吾尔自治区乌鲁木齐市的城市轨道交通系统，其首条线路于2018年10月25日开通试运营，使乌鲁木齐成为西北地区第二个开通运营地铁的城市。
desc.en: Urumqi Metro is an urban rail transit system serving Urumqi City, Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region, China. Its first line was put into trial operation on October 25, 2018, making Urumqi the second city in the northwest region to open and operate a subway.
